com.netflix.servo.stats

Class StatsConfig.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.servo.stats.StatsConfig.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    StatsConfig

    public static class StatsConfig.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for StatsConfig. By default the configuration includes count, total and 95th and 99th percentiles.

      • withPublishMax

        public StatsConfig.Builder withPublishMax(boolean publishMax)
        Whether to publish max or not.

      • withPublishMean

        public StatsConfig.Builder withPublishMean(boolean publishMean)
        Whether to publish an average statistic or not. Note that if you plan to aggregate the values reported (for example across a cluster of nodes) you probably do not want to publish the average per node, and instead want to compute it by publishing total and count.

      • withPublishVariance

        public StatsConfig.Builder withPublishVariance(boolean publishVariance)
        Whether to publish variance or not.

      • withPublishStdDev

        public StatsConfig.Builder withPublishStdDev(boolean publishStdDev)
        Whether to publish standard deviation or not.

      • withPercentiles

        public StatsConfig.Builder withPercentiles(double[] percentiles)
        Set the percentiles to compute.
        Parameters:
        percentiles - An array of doubles describing which percentiles to compute. For example {95.0, 99.0}

      • withSampleSize

        public StatsConfig.Builder withSampleSize(int size)
        Set the sample size.

      • withComputeFrequencyMillis

        public StatsConfig.Builder withComputeFrequencyMillis(long frequencyMillis)
        How often to compute the statistics. Usually this will be set to the main poller interval. (Default is 60s.)

      • build

        public StatsConfig build()
        Create a new StatsConfig object.
